Source code for maxaimodel.spark.regression.spark_gl_regression

from maxaibase.model.spark.spark_regressor import SparkRegressorBaseModel
from maxairesources.factory.model_factory import ModelFactory
from maxairesources.logging.logger import get_logger

from pyspark.ml.regression import GeneralizedLinearRegression, GeneralizedLinearRegressionModel

logger = get_logger(__name__)



[docs]@ModelFactory.register_model("SparkGLRegressor")
class SparkGLRegressor(SparkRegressorBaseModel):
    """runs generalized linear regression on data and gives predictions
    
    Args:
        target_col (float): column to be predicted
        feature_col (str): vectorised list of all the features used for prediction
        params (dict, optional): dictionary of parameters described [here](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/reference/api/pyspark.ml.regression.GeneralizedLinearRegression.html?highlight=regression#pyspark.ml.regression.GeneralizedLinearRegression). Defaults to None
        param_grid (dict, optional): dictionary of parameters of type `{"param": []}`. If `param_grid` is mentioned, it will over-write `params`. Defaults to None.

    --------
    Example:
    ```
    from maxaimodel.spark.regression import spark_gl_regression

    glinreg = spark_gl_regression.SparkGLRegressor(
                target_col = 'medv',
                feature_col = 'features',
                param_grid =  {}
                )

    glinreg.fit(train)
    pred_glinreg = gbt.predict(test)

    pred_glinreg.show(5)
    >>> +--------------------+----+------------------+
        |            features|medv|        prediction|
        +--------------------+----+------------------+
        |[0.04417,70.0,2.2...|24.8|30.846373877566844|
        |[0.03537,34.0,6.0...|22.0|25.034746106946816|
        |[0.09266,34.0,6.0...|26.4|25.456822769467188|
        |[0.1,34.0,6.09,0....|33.1| 32.40380891308272|
        |[0.05515,33.0,2.1...|36.1| 22.23621896235877|
        +--------------------+----+------------------+
    
    glinreg.save(path = "./models/glinreg")
    glinreg.save(path = "s3a://zs-sample-datasets-ds/pai-onboarding/regression_model_testing/glinreg/", mode="onnx")
    ```
    """
    def __init__(self, target_col, feature_col, id_col=None, params=None, param_grid=None):
        super().__init__()
        self.id_col = id_col
        self.target_col = target_col
        self.feature_col = feature_col
        self.param_grid = param_grid
        self.params = params
        self.build(params)


[docs]    def build(self, params):
        if ((self.params != "") and (bool(self.params)) and (self.params is not None)):
            self.model = GeneralizedLinearRegression(
                labelCol=self.target_col, 
                featuresCol=self.feature_col, 
                **params
            ) 
        else:
            self.model = GeneralizedLinearRegression(
                labelCol=self.target_col, 
                featuresCol=self.feature_col
            )

        logger.info("model instance created successfully")



[docs]    def load(self, path):
        self.model = GeneralizedLinearRegressionModel.load(path)
        logger.info("model load successfully")
